properties.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Inland Cameron; Southern Hidalgo; Inland Kenedy; Coastal Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Coastal Willacy; Northern Hidalgo
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 7 at 4:08AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Patchy fog overnight is expected to expand across portions of Deep
South Texas and the Rio Grande Valley over the next few hours as a
cold front approaches. Visibility may generally be reduced to 1
to 3 miles, with locally dense fog reducing visibilities to less
than one half mile at times. Any fog is expected to dissipate
near sunrise this morning, after the passage of the weak cold
front and northerly winds increase.

Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning as
visibilities may change rapidly over short distances. Use low beam
headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and
others on the road when encountering significant reductions in
visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

NWSheadline: Fog Expected Across Portions of Deep South Texas
